response.overview: On 18th July 2000, the doors to Britainâ€™s most famous TV house first opened to usher in what would become 11 years of the most memorable, controversial and groundbreaking television ever seen. What started as a social experiment has become a global phenomenon that has kept both viewers and housemates gripped with constant surprises and the occasional slice of controversy. This commemorates 11 years of Big Brother with the most favourite shows as voted for by viewers and super fan/presenter, Davina McCall and a run down of the best bits from all 11 series from 2000-2010. Contains 3 full episodes and an exclusive montage!
response.title: Big Brother's Big DVD

titles.title: Big Brother's Big DVD The Best Bits: 2000 - 2010
